thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Macom Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.10

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Macom Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.10
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Macom Technology Solutions Holdings Inc :
* MACOM REPORTS FISCAL FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.49 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 REVENUE FELL 13.7 PERCENT TO $130.9 MILLION * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $142 MILLION TO $150 MILLION * SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 TO $0.16 * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.28, REVENUE VIEW $149.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
